tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Dr. Lektzian is one of my favorite professors I have taken at Texas Tech University mostly due to his lecture methods. He does an excellent job of providing students with either side of an argument whether it correlates with his view, your view, or any other person\'s view. He is respectful to all his students and provides ample opportunity to pass.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Great learning environment that encourages critical thinking skills. He teaches the subject fairly giving valid examples from both sides. If you have a different viewpoint, he acknowledges and nurtures what\'s on your mind. Laid back atmosphere, and wonderful classroom discussions. 1010 would take again. I got a B because I didn\'t study.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  RESPECTED  CARING
comments: Dr. Lektzian is clearly incredibly knowledgable about the material he teaches. He\'s able to teach the class in a way that helps you learn the material but also makes you feel invested. I took him over a Maymester and wish I would\'ve taken him during a long semester. If you see his name listed as your professor, don\'t worry; you\'re in great hands.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Great professor. Really dedicated to actually teaching you. DO THE REVIEW. Everything from the review are on the test. Interesting lectures and you actually learn interesting stuff. Great class, would love to take him again.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Taken during summer. Easy class. Powerpoints with a couple movies. Tests are easy, from powerpoints. No book heavy reading.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I took his class during the summer, and now I\'m really wishing that I had taken it during the semester. He\'s well versed on IR and has tons of cool experiences to share. Some people had a difficult time with quizzes/tests. Make sure you\'re in class each day for pop quizzes and take good notes!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Very interesting class, and professor Lektzian is also very helpful. Tests are just like the lectures. He does not take attendance but he does give out a few quizzes every now and then.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I hardly ever went to class and made it out with a B. I studied hardcore for the tests though (there were only 2; a midterm and final). He\'s very nice but gives you a few pop quizzes to monitor attendance but if you miss one or two it\'s no big deal. I didn\'t read any of the books but got a B on the final paper/presentation and as my final grade.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Not really hard, but read the book. Thoroughly answer the review study guide he posts online and you\'ll be fine. He curves the exams so that the class average is a 75. My average for the class was a 101.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Make sure you show up, in my class attendance wasn\'t mandatory but he would randomly have pop quizzes with questions like "What\'s your favorite color?" I never really studied and got a 90 in it so he\'s good!!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Super easy. Doesn\'t take attendence. No assignments. 4 tests, 40 Q each with an hour and 20 minutes to finish. just read the book and get the power points from his site and your\'re all set. I only got a C because I was lazy and didn\'t read. He\'s easy going if your miss an exam and have a good reason for it. He just wants yuo to do well and pass.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Caring (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Easy teacher that does not take attendance. He will randomly have extra credit quizzes during class that refer to questions such as "Who\'s going to win the game this weekend; Answer: TECH." He uses powerpoints during his lectures that are available for print. There is no homework. Tests are not too bad. Good teacher!
